org.phantomapi.wraith

Interface NPCWrapper

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Wraith
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhantomNPCWrapper, PhantomWraith

    public interface NPCWrapper
    NPC wrapper
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • spawn

        void spawn(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Spawn the npc at the given location. NOTE, you must call this before using most methods
        Parameters:
        location - the given location

      • despawn

        void despawn()
        Despawn the given npc. Ensure to destroy it if you do not plan on re-spawning it

      • isSpawned

        boolean isSpawned()
        Is the entity spawned?
        Returns:
        true if the entity is spawned
